publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7108 Pauline McNeill: Congratulations to Peter Mullen—That the Parliament congratulates Peter Mullen on his success at the 2010 San Sebastián International Film Festival; recognises his success in winning two awards, including the top prize in the Best Film category, and considers that this clearly demonstrates the wealth of cultural talent available in Scotland. Supported by: Joe FitzPatrick* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-7108 Congratulations to Peter Mullan (lodged on 28 September 2010) Dr Richard Simpson*, Jamie Hepburn*, Sarah Boyack*

S3M-7108 Pauline McNeill: Congratulations to Peter Mullan—That the Parliament congratulates Peter Mullan on his success at the 2010 San Sebastián International Film Festival; recognises his success in winning two awards, including the top prize in the Best Film category, and considers that this clearly demonstrates the wealth of cultural talent available in Scotland. Supported by: Joe FitzPatrick, Dr Richard Simpson, Jamie Hepburn, Sarah Boyack
